DemoblazePage_63093eca1a95fe9da9a61e9e52.description: This page displays the details of a specific product on the Demoblaze e-commerce site.

elements.name: Product Title
elements.description: The title of the product being displayed.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: The price of the product.

elements.name: Product Description
elements.description: Detailed description of the product.

elements.name: Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Product Image
elements.description: Main image of the product.

elements.name: Categories - Phones
elements.description: Link to navigate to the phones category.

elements.name: Categories - Laptops
elements.description: Link to navigate to the laptops category.

elements.name: Categories - Monitors
elements.description: Link to navigate to the monitors category.

assertions: Verify that the product title is displayed.
Verify that the product price is displayed.
Verify that the product description is displayed.
Verify that the 'Add to cart' button is present.
Verify that the product image is displayed.

ProductDetailsSonyVaioI5Page_fc37ec213a7.description: This page displays the details of a specific product, in this case, the Sony Vaio i5 laptop. It includes the product name, price, description, and an 'Add to cart' button.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: The name of the product.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: The price of the product.

elements.name: Product Description
elements.description: The description of the product.

elements.name: Add to cart
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

assertions: Verify the page title contains 'PRODUCT STORE'
Verify the product name is 'Sony vaio i5'
Verify the 'Add to cart' button is present

SaucedemoInventoryPage_fa88e78e227126b6c.description: This page displays the inventory of products available for purchase on the Saucedemo website.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: The name of the product, which links to the product details page.

elements.name: Product Description
elements.description: The description of the product.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: The price of the product.

elements.name: Add to Cart Button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Remove Button
elements.description: Button to remove the product from the shopping cart.

elements.name: Products Header
elements.description: The header text indicating the page displays products.

elements.name: Filter/Sort Dropdown
elements.description: Dropdown to filter or sort the products.

elements.name: Shopping Cart Link
elements.description: Link to the shopping cart page.

assertions: Page contains a header with the text 'Products'
At least one product item is displayed on the page
The 'Add to cart' button is visible for products not in the cart
The 'Remove' button is visible for products already in the cart

ProductsPage_3e224a86efe014ed42c6fdf6ca7.description: The Products page displays available products, categories, brands, and allows users to view product details, add to cart, and write reviews.

elements.description: Category filter for Kids' products.

elements.description: Brand filter for Polo products.

elements.description: Brand filter for H&M products.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: Name of the displayed product.

elements.name: Product Price
elements.description: Price of the displayed product.

elements.name: Quantity Input
elements.description: Input field to specify the quantity of the product.

elements.name: Add to Cart Button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the shopping cart.

elements.name: Your Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's name when writing a review.

elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's email address when writing a review.

elements.description: Textarea for the user to write their product review.

CartPage_e006fb0ab31e563596e879b18482878.description: This page displays the details of a product after it has been added to the cart. It allows the user to view the cart or continue shopping.

elements.name: View Cart Link
elements.description: Link to navigate to the cart page.

elements.name: Continue Shopping Button
elements.description: Button to continue shopping and close the modal.

elements.name: Product Name
elements.description: Name of the product added to cart.

elements.name: Add to cart button
elements.description: Button to add the product to the cart.

elements.name: Write Your Review Section
elements.description: Section to write a review for the product.

elements.name: Your Name Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's name.

elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for the user's email address.

elements.name: Add Review Here Input
elements.description: Textarea for the user to write their review.

assertions: Verify that the 'Added!' modal is displayed.
Verify that the product name is displayed correctly.
Verify that the 'View Cart' link is present.
Verify that the 'Continue Shopping' button is present.
Verify that the 'WRITE YOUR REVIEW' section is present.

UnknownPage_9fb1b48a8cec8ececfbd7c5c9352.description: This page displays the items in the user's shopping cart, allowing them to review their order and proceed to checkout.

elements.name: Proceed to Checkout Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the checkout page.

elements.name: Cart Item Description
elements.description: Description of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Cart Item Price
elements.description: Price of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Cart Item Quantity
elements.description: Quantity of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Cart Item Total
elements.description: Total price of the item in the cart.

elements.name: Remove Cart Item Button
elements.description: Button to remove an item from the cart.

elements.name: Subscription Email Input
elements.description: Input field for subscription email.

elements.name: Subscription Submit Button
elements.description: Button to submit the subscription form.
